title: Trip To Miami? Can't Take That Back...
itunes:title: Trip To Miami? Can't Take That Back...
description:
FRI 10/14 - DJ Envy and Angela Yee hit Miami for the Revolt Music Conference while Charlamagne holds down the base in NYC. Shawn Prez from the Global Spin Awards joins the show to talk about honoring and respecting the art of the DJ. A former baseball star gets a HUGE hee-haw for trying to defend Trump's comments to the 10 year old girl. We survey our live audience on the question, "Should you give gifts back after you breakup with someone?"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
